DOC.brief_title: Sequential Chemotherapy Lenalidomide Followed Rituximab Lenalidomide Maintenance Untreated Mantle Cell Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: Patients receive lenalidomide 15 mg orally daily day 1-14 standard-dose R-CHOP ( 375 mg/m^2 intravenous rituximab , 750 mg/m2 intravenous cyclophosphamide , 50 mg/m^2 intravenous doxorubicin , 1.4 mg/m2 intravenous vincristine day 1 , 100 mg prednisone day 1-5 day 2-6 ) every 21 day four cycle . All patient receive pegfilgrastim day 2 cycle aspirin 81 mg orally daily venous thromboembolism prophylaxis throughout four cycle . After four cycle Len-RCHOP , patient undergo restaging PET/CT scan . Patients evidence disease progression treat study . R-HIDAC After lenalidomide-RCHOP phase , patient without evidence progressive disease receive rituximab 375 mg/m^2 day 1 patient admit high-dose cytarabine ( HIDAC ) . Recommended age-adjusted HIDAC dose follow : ≤65 year : 3 g/m2 every12 hour X 4 dos ; 65-70 year : 2 g/m^2 every12 hour X 4 dos ; > 70 year : 1 g/m^2 every12 hour X 4 dos . Physician discretion dictate choice HIDAC dose , range 1 g/m^2 - 3 g/m^2 every 12 hour X 4 dos . Patients receive two cycle rituximab-HIDAC every 3 week . After two cycle R-HIDAC , patient undergo restaging PET/CT scan . Patients evidence disease progression treat study . Len-Rituximab Maintenance After completion induction chemotherapy Len-RCHOP R-HIDAC , patient begin maintenance phase lenalidomide rituximab 6 month . Lenalidomide administer 15 mg orally daily day 1-21 28-day cycle total 6 cycle rituximab maintenance every 8 week total 3 treatment .
